code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ForgetPassword(){const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();alert("Password reset link sent to "+email);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen flex items-center justify-center bg-gray-100",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-8 rounded-lg shadow-lg w-full max-w-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-center mb-6",children:"Forgot Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{class:"block text-gray-700 font-medium mb-2",children:"Email Address"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Enter your email address",className:"w-full px-3 py-2 border rounded-lg",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"w-full bg-blue-500 text-white py-2 rounded-lg hover:bg-blue-600",children:"Send Reset Link"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"mt-6 text-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/login",class:"text-blue-500 hover:underline",children:"Back to Login"})})]})]})});}export default ForgetPassword;
